Articles.Content:
Hey everyone i was looking for a mod that shows Center of Mass and Lift when playing not in the VAB or SPH

if there is one please reply with the link

if there is no such thing i hope this would be an idea for a new mod

Thanks

- Abdunaut

RCS Build Aid will show you how the CoM will displace as fuel is consumed so there's that.

As for the rest, why? The camera is already centered on the CoM in-flight. CoL doesn't move really unless you plan on making an ornithopter.

if i used Magic Smoke Industries - Infernal Robotics to make a moving wing will the CoL moves?

Edited October 26, 2014 by Abdu
Yes, with both stock aerodynamics and FAR.
